notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: HM was responsible for the collection and preparation of plant materials, performed data analysis and drafted the manuscript; HC performed the experiments related to antioxidant activities. JK, MBH and HL performed the experiments related to enzyme inhibitions; SH performed the essential oil extraction; GF performed the identification of essential oil compounds; LA and BS organized this work and contributed to writing the manuscript. All authors have contributed to the writing and revision and read and approved the final manuscript.
